column5: Hello  My original plans for fishing tomorrow got cancelled and I am looking to go for some Salmon, or stream trout.  I know its late but the fishing has been great and the time line is short..  I will be fly-fishing but floaters are cool ..  Give me a call (416) 536-8209  I live in T.O (high-park( and am willing to split all expences..  Dave
So if anyone would like to get together pm me or call.
Wish I lived closer.....you were my first      For anyone who may be thinking of it - do it, Dave is a great guy and knows a lot of [i]spots[/i
Thanks Nancy  I remember when you were a virgin with steelhead...  How are you with salmon..  If your every up this way let me know and I will help with that problem as well.  LOL  Dave
Hey Dave, You get my PM? Geoff
